#summary This page lists the sequence in which various PTX instructions and their respective opcode will be probed

= PTX Probing Priority =
This page lists the sequence in which various PTX instructions and their respective opcode will be probed.

The lesser the indent, the greater the priority.

===First Group===
mov, ld, st, add, sub

===Second Group===
set, setp, testp, neg, and, or, mul, bra, call, ret, exit

=== By Type ===
====Integer Instructions====
<pre>
add //addition, all 6 types
sub //substraction, 6 types
mul //multiplication
neg //negate
	abs //absolute
	min
	max
	mad //multiply+add
	sad //sum of absolute difference
	div //division
	rem //remainder
		popc //one count
		clz  //count leading zero
		bfind
		brev
		bfe
		bfi
		prmt
		add.cc, addc
		sub.cc, subc
		mul24
		mad24
</pre>
